title: BIP 42: Contribution from Treasury to Badger Pool on Pooltogether
body:
TLDR; Seek community approval to contribute 2400 Badger (200 Badger per week for 12 weeks) to the Badger Pool on Pooltogether from the Badger Treasury.

Link to Discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-42-contribution-from-treasury-to-badger-pool-on-pooltogether/3691
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
